modName: Fish Pickup Sound Fix for Magical Alchemy Harvest-o-tron
summary: This is a mod I made to remove the annoying sound that occurs near water when you use the automatic ingredient harvesting enchantment mod Ghostifish Magical Harvest-o-Tron.
descriptionHtml:
I use the Magical Alchemy Harvest-o-tron mod to automatically harvest ingredients whilst I'm running around. The trouble with the mod though is that whenever you go near water or a nirnroot the ingredient harvest sound repeats over and over...

So I made this mod that removes the fish and nirnroot ingredient harvest sound. Thus it makes the Magical Alchemy Harvest-o-tron an even more pleasant mod to have.

Ghostifish's Magical Alchemy Harvest-o-tron mod can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15899
author: zyg0tic

files.name: Fish and Nirnroot Pickup Sound Removed
